desc: Hourglass, the cruelty free beauty brand, is known for its innovation and commitment to reinventing luxury cosmetics. Complexion, color and skincare are crafted to be undetectably transformative while effortless to apply.

layout.text:
DISCOVER THE GLOW THAT RADIATES FROM WITHIN, FEATURING JULIANNE MOORE AND
HER DAUGHTER LIV FREUNDLICH.
